Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection

Class ConnectionRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection.ConnectionClient
it.polimi.ingsw.client.connection.ConnectionRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIClientConnection, Serializable, Remote
public class ConnectionRMI extends ConnectionClient implements RMIClientConnection
Implementation of Clients RMI connection

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionRMI

      public ConnectionRMI(ClientController controller, String address, int port) throws RemoteException
      Initialize the RMI connection to the server
      Parameters:
      controller - ClientController, on which it will call all the methods after the server request
      address - IP address of the server
      port - IP port of the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred during the connection

  • Method Details

    • startConnection

      public void startConnection() throws IOException, NotBoundException, NullPointerException
      Start the connection and the login in RMI
      Specified by:
      startConnection in class ConnectionClient
      Throws:
      IOException - throws if it has an error with input or output
      NotBoundException - throws if it has an error with the connection
      NullPointerException - throws if it has an error with the server instance

      Specified by:
      setSavedGame in class ConnectionClient
      Parameters:
